titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiestie continuing her most gracious purpose, to the reformation of the base monies of this realme ...
Proclamations. 1561-02-19
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Povvles Churhcyarde, by Richard Iugge, and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maistie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: A proclamation calling in base money.
Actual printers and suggested publication date from STC.
At foot of page: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
